amendment.description: Page 78, beginning on line 17, strike "(6)" and all that follows through "(7)", and insert (6). Page 78, line 23, strike "(8)" and insert "(7)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to strike out requirement 6 in Sec. 505 of the General Provisions account and renumber subsequent requirements accordingly.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Sessions amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Sessions.
